programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2117
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep13
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Meis father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Undiscovered Tomb
programme.desc: On the remote border between China and India, adventurer Ivy scours the land in search of the undiscovered tomb rumored to house the long-lost Pills of Eternity. However, she is not the only one searching for these powerful pills.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Girl Who Loved To Laugh
programme.desc: Marie Husler, the girl with Down syndrome, mysteriously disappeared before her 18th birthday. 15 years later, her wax corpse is found in Lake Constance, weighed down with iron chains, and two commissioners are called upon to investigate the mystery.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Mezas decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: A Butterfly's Heart
programme.desc: Juozapas is a quiet boy who cultivates insects in an abandoned house. He has a big bulge under his weird sweater and the schools tough kids call him balloon. Rugil moves to town and becomes Juozapas friend. She is the first to discover his secret.

programme.title: Clara's Kitchen
programme.desc: Clara is forced to stay at her grandmother Lucings house for the weekend after finding out her parents had just separated and the only way Lucing can communicate with her granddaughter is through what she knows and does best: her cooking.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Men In the City
programme.desc: A Berlin gym is the stage for five men to play out their testosterone-filled pursuits of casual sex, camaraderie and contoured bodies. As they stumble from one misadventure to another, including wrestling a crocodile, they learn the meaning of true love.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha

programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Namas decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 21
programme.desc: The guys make a mockery of each other as restaurant managers, name that (made up) tune with strangers, and then head to the park for some awkward fun in the sun. Plus, the big loser gets wrapped up in a birthday surprise.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
programme.desc: An inventive eleven year-old New Yorkers discovery of a key in his deceased father's belongings sets him off on an urgent search across the city for the lock it will open.

programme.title: Going In Style (2017)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. Set during World War II, the story follows the orphaned Peter, who's kidnapped by pirates and brought to the magical Neverland, where he finds both fun and dangers and ultimately discovers his destiny to free the land from the pirate Blackbeard and become the hero who will forever be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.desc: An enormous beast goes on a worldwide destructive rampage and is headed toward New York City.

programme.desc: American soldiers get a brutal education when a mission gone awry results in the U.S. military's single biggest firefight since Vietnam.

programme.desc: Scotland - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to Scotland to see the Goddard family who live off-grid.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep3
programme.desc: A once in a generation eruption on a volcanic island. In the United States, heavy rain and snow melt submerge a town and in Italy, giant hail pulls up pavements, and traps drivers in their cars.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Black Tip Sharks - Steve Backshall is taking ten novice divers on one Deadly mission - to dive with sharks in Bimini, the shark capital of the world, with the ultimate goal being to qualify as scuba divers.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lemon Sharks - Some of the team explores the mangroves, which are essential for the survival of some sharks. While there, they come face to face with baby lemon sharks.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Water - Fresh water is the lifeblood of planet Earth, where incredible animal dramas play out. From death-feigning fish to frogs that glide, each depends on fresh water for their survival.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep1
programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep2
programme.desc: A look at ready-to-blend fruit smoothies, and turning raw organic cocoa beans into chocolate bars. Plus the production of delicious paneer, and the story behind wasabi.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Southern Stingrays - Bad weather causes sea sickness among the team, and their next diving lesson has to be abandoned.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Nurse Sharks - It's time to celebrate, as Steve Backshall's team of ten shark saviours have all passed their dive training and are now fully qualified scuba divers.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Exmoor - Kate enjoys an 11-mile walk in Exmoor along the South West Coast Path, regarded as one of the most beautiful coastal paths in the world. Starting at Porlock Weir, Kate heads to St Bueno's, a tiny parish church that seats just 33 worshippers - and which holds a dark past. She then heads inland to see the valley that inspired RD Blackmore's 1869 novel of outlaws and revenge, Lorna Doone.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ghost of the Reef - Off the coast of Tanzania lurks a fish so violent it is known to ram sharks to death and even attack humans. Cyril explores the area with some local fishermen.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter's Surprise - For Alaskans, the return of winter brings new and dangerous challenges.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the Lens - Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Humpback Birth of a Giant - Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the Lens - Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Here Comes the Rain - Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies and raising them is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.desc: How Smart Are Sharks? - Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep4
programme.desc: How Smart Are Sharks? - Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chasing Mako - In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep4
programme.desc: How Smart Are Sharks? - Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Beach Around The World S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bright Days In Belize - After the loss of her husband, a woman kept their traveling traditions alive and feels Belize's Caye Caulker is perfect for the family's future home.

programme.title: Flip To A Million S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Showing Some Heart In Texas - With just six months and $1,000, two flipping duos try to turn their properties into a million-dollar sale. Can they prove they can make a real estate fortune?

programme.title: Windy City Rehab: Alison's Dream Home S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Designing The Dream - Alison puts it all on the line when she jumps into an ambitious personal renovation without the cash to pay for it.

programme.title: Christina On The Coast S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Taking The Plunge - As homeowners Jon and Lindsay take on two renovations at once, Christina ensures the living area and kitchen match the updated pool and outdoor space.

programme.title: Lakefront Bargain Hunt Renovation S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Next Up Niagara - A family of five want to find a getaway near their home in Buffalo, New York. They have a tight budget but are ready to take on a renovation challenge.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Right In Our Own Backyard - Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a husband-and-wife team from Florida. They help clients build the perfect house from the ground up in 100 days or less.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S4 Ep10
programme.desc: A Musical Forever Home - A musical family moved into their home over ten years ago, but now that their children are all teenagers, they realize their family's needs have changed.

programme.title: Beach Around The World S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Perfect Place In Portugal - A New York couple dreams of moving to Portugal after falling in love with the country while traveling in Europe.

programme.title: Beach Around The World S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bright Days In Belize - After the loss of her husband, a woman kept their traveling traditions alive and feels Belize's Caye Caulker is perfect for the family's future home.

programme.title: Home Inspector Joe S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Fixing A Troublesome Tudor - Home inspector Joe Mazza wont let anyone move into a risky property. Along with designer Noel Gatts, he helps families find and renovate their dream home.

programme.title: Christina On The Coast S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Taking The Plunge - As homeowners Jon and Lindsay take on two renovations at once, Christina ensures the living area and kitchen match the updated pool and outdoor space.

programme.desc: Next Up Niagara - A family of five want to find a getaway near their home in Buffalo, New York. They have a tight budget but are ready to take on a renovation challenge.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab: Alison's Dream Home S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Designing The Dream - Alison puts it all on the line when she jumps into an ambitious personal renovation without the cash to pay for it.

programme.title: Flip To A Million S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Showing Some Heart In Texas - With just six months and $1,000, two flipping duos try to turn their properties into a million-dollar sale. Can they prove they can make a real estate fortune?

programme.title: Lil Jon Wants To Do What? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Midcentury To This Century - Musician Lil Jon and designer Anitra have to save a house stuck in the '70s, but the hipster homeowners don't want to lose all of the disco design.

programme.title: House Hunters International S121 Ep8
programme.desc: Lots To Learn In Cambridge, England - A Cambridge student seeks modern comforts while living the old English lifestyle with his wife.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Girl Who Loved To Laugh
programme.desc: Marie Husler, the girl with Down syndrome, mysteriously disappeared before her 18th birthday. 15 years later, her wax corpse is found in Lake Constance, weighed down with iron chains, and two commissioners are called upon to investigate the mystery.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Mezas decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her familys biggest fear is not her going to jail, its preserving their honour.

programme.title: A Butterfly's Heart
programme.desc: Juozapas is a quiet boy who cultivates insects in an abandoned house. He has a big bulge under his weird sweater and the schools tough kids call him balloon. Rugil moves to town and becomes Juozapas friend. She is the first to discover his secret.

programme.title: Girl In Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Clara's Kitchen
programme.desc: Clara is forced to stay at her grandmother Lucings house for the weekend after finding out her parents had just separated and the only way Lucing can communicate with her granddaughter is through what she knows and does best: her cooking.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: Men In the City
programme.desc: A Berlin gym is the stage for five men to play out their testosterone-filled pursuits of casual sex, camaraderie and contoured bodies. As they stumble from one misadventure to another, including wrestling a crocodile, they learn the meaning of true love.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jrmie dreams of a life away from his familys sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his fathers despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusufs best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusufs calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her familys biggest fear is not her going to jail, its preserving their honour.

programme.title: Girl In Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jrmie dreams of a life away from his familys sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his fathers despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna
programme.desc: When Hallers sister, Sophie, is abducted by a ruthless gang, he decides to pursue them without involving the police. Together with his assistant, Niko, they expertly use their wits and intelligence to outsmart the criminals and bring Sophie to safety.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusufs best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusufs calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Namas decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Stacey and her team help declutter a family home that contains 521 odd socks and 75 Barbies.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Incredible House Transformations - Kevin McCloud and the experts visit five homes that have undergone incredible transformations, from a Dutch barn and a factory reborn, to a library hidden within a former cowshed.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Irene and Richard - Using virtual reality, two top architects compete to remodel Irene and Richard's family home in Croydon. Will they go for Laura's double bunk beds or Lizzie's colourful side extension?

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Rick boards the ferry in Penzance to take him to the Isles of Scilly, a group of islands which were once part of Cornwall. And in the world-famous gardens of Tresco, Rick meets a beekeeper attempting to breed a native Scillonian honeybee to deal with the harsh Atlantic climate. This inspires Rick to cook a honey pudding with Cornish ice cream and a butterscotch sauce.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Emilia Romagna - Gino gets behind the wheel of a Ferrari in Emilia Romagna - the birthplace of the marque - and samples the region's famous balsamic vinegar.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The second set of cooks pitch their dish and cookbook ideas to the judges, including all about lasagnes, celebrating seasonal produce and easy Asian-inspired recipes. Who has the recipe for success?

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Mexico City, Paul samples the best taco he's ever had, discovers how to make Pan Dulce, attempts to eat a tarantula, goes on a takeaway food tour and has a go at fire hockey.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Dessert Week - The bakers put their twist on the classic pavlova and take on a toffee technical, before creating a delicate dessert wrapped in intricately patterned sponge for a splendid showstopper.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy S1 Ep1

programme.desc: Building A New Life On Oahu - After holidaying in Hawaii for years, a woman is permanently swapping Seattle for a new life on Oahu. She wants a move-in ready home with a garden.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S12 Ep13
programme.desc: Newly Engaged And Moving Back To Oahu - An engaged couple are moving back to Oahu with their two dogs and her mother. Their wish list includes a big garden and an open kitchen.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Crime Of The Century - A butcher stands accused of murdering his wife and turning her into sausage meat, and a talkative parrot provides a vital clue in a bartender's murder.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Deadly Deception - An attempt to contact the dead leads to betrayal, deception, and murder. Then a baby-obsessed woman will do anything to become a mother.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Huckleberrys Monster - Huckleberry reveals his family's terrifying brush with the Grafton Monster. Later, Jeff breaks out his "hillbilly hazmat suit" to do some bloodwork on an old dog collar.

programme.title: Evil Things S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Wardrobe And The Interview - A terrifying surprise awaits the new owners of an antique cabinet. And, a desperate man uncovers horrifying secrets hidden in an abandoned church.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Surfer Girls - Take a safari with bikini clad surfers and a thrill fest with waterslides.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Gangsters & Alligators - Go inside the Gateway Arch, visit the remains of a once-mighty North American city and more.

programme.title: Caribbean Life S5 Ep1
programme.desc: A Change of Pace in Belize - An Atlanta couple decides to leave their busy life behind for clean living in Belize.

programme.title: Caribbean Life S5 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Beginning in Belize - A Maryland-based couple searches for a home and business opportunity on Ambergris Caye in Belize.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Stranger Than Fiction - A horrific crime scene on a lakefront triggers an investigation into an author and his unplanned confession.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Honor Thy Mother - Ed Gein's grief at the loss of his mother leads to frightening tales of murder. A random twist of fate raises questions about the death of a thrill-seeking teenager.

programme.title: Evil Things S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wrong Number And The Dybbuk Box - Terror comes calling when a woman renovates an old roadhouse diner. A podcast host brings one of Americas most famous haunted object into his home.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brians untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep16
programme.desc: Meet the Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branchs Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique Gem), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branchs gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep36
programme.desc: Shellabyrinth / Helping Hans - Berry runs away from responsibility only to learn a lesson of responsibility, and then totally disregard the lesson learned because being responsible is a trap. / The Mighty Ones meet a multi-tool named Hans, and find uses for his various attachments, while Hans wrestles with his own self-worth.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep69
programme.desc: Puss In Book - While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.
