programme.desc: Puss In Book - While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep13
programme.desc: Ruperts Magic Car - Miranda the Mermaid has never been able to visit Nutwood - until Rupert has a clever idea

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep14
programme.desc: Rupert and the Unusual Birthday - It's Edward's birthday and Rupert wants to give him the best birthday party ever. Ping Pong tries to speed things up by using her magic but it turns everything topsy-turvy. How can Rupert give Edward his party now?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep15
programme.desc: Rupert and the Rainbow - It's a colourful Nutwood when Rupert and Ping Pong try to use the Rainbow to paint pictures with.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep16
programme.desc: Rupert and the Toy Soldiers - When Ping Pong's spell to fix a broken toy Soldier goes wrong Rupert and his friends need help from an unexpected source to get him back in the box.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Olivia Ep35
programme.desc: Olivia Runs A Carnival - When Mrs. Hogenmuller's class plans a Parents' Night, Olivia thrills her classmates when she suggests the idea of a carnival. In her own special way Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements, and when the night of the carnival arrives, she still has a few surprises up her sleeve.

programme.title: Olivia Ep36
programme.desc: Olivia Makes Magic - After seeing Grandma perform an impromptu magic show, Olivia begins practicing her own magic tricks. She doesn't have much success, until she manages to make herself disappear for Ian and Julian. They can't figure out how she's done it, but Ian doesn't care. He just wants his big sister back!

programme.title: Olivia Ep37
programme.desc: Olivia Visits The Aquarium - On a school trip to the aquarium, Olivia and her classmates compete to be the first to view all the exhibits and win a chance to help feed the sea-lions. Olivia is partnered with Francine, and the two girls have to reconcile their different approaches in order to win the prize.

programme.title: Olivia Ep38
programme.desc: Olivia And The Anniversary Surprise - It's Olivia's parents' anniversary, and they're planning a night out at a special restaurant. When they can't find a babysitter, Grandma happily volunteers. When Olivia suggests they all surprise Mum and Dad at dinner, she discovers the restaurant isn't at all the way she imagined, but it's a lot more fun!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep15
programme.desc: Why Porcupine Has Quills - You see there was a time when Porcupine didn't have quills, she had the softest coat in all of Tinga Tinga and Jackal wanted it. Despite warnings from all the animals Porcupine allows Jackal to invite her to his cave to keep out of the rain. Porcupine takes off her coat to allow it to dry, but while she sleeps naughty Jackal runs off with it. When she awakes Porcupine is covered in lots of tiny ant bites and they itch and they itch and they itch. Tortoise suggests Elephant squeeze some milk from the Milky Quill bush but Porcupine can't wait anymore and runs into the Quill bushes to relieve her itching. Crash! Crash! Crash! Porcupine crashes through the Quill bushes and emerges covered in spikey quills! The animals can't believe their eyes! But Porcupine is delighted as no beast will ever come near her sensitive skin ever again! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesnt feel useful now thats hes no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branchs bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep42
programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica / Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as Mandy Monkhuahua; In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep29
programme.desc: Jolly Olde England - Wally and Wenda's plan to watch a soccer game in London is interrupted when Odlulu and Fritz use the Key in the Stone to summon a medieval castle in the middle of modern-day England. It's up to the Wanderers to stop King Fritz before his knights turn London upside down!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep63
programme.desc: The Neighs Have It - The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep2
programme.desc: While You Weren't Sleeping / The Secret Strife of Pets - Sick of nighttime cutting fun short, the kids pulls an all-nighter. A mystery critter shows up on Harvey Street and Dot wants it gone!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep36
programme.desc: Shellabyrinth / Helping Hans - Berry runs away from responsibility only to learn a lesson of responsibility, and then totally disregard the lesson learned because being responsible is a trap. / The Mighty Ones meet a multi-tool named Hans, and find uses for his various attachments, while Hans wrestles with his own self-worth.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep36
programme.desc: Shellabyrinth / Helping Hans - Berry runs away from responsibility only to learn a lesson of responsibility, and then totally disregard the lesson learned because being responsible is a trap. / The Mighty Ones meet a multi-tool named Hans, and find uses for his various attachments, while Hans wrestles with his own self-worth.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert and the Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bays famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zo has invited all of Peppa and Georges friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - Its Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Journey Into A Black Hole/ Paddington's Rainbow Race - When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire - Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new super trike. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Toms's Birthday Surprise / Family Treasure Hunt - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Toms a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Dr. Abuela - When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Water Buggin - When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Deep Blue Boo Boo / Stuck Together - When the Robotons dump a load of plastic in the Crystal Lake, a raging lake monster appears and Rammy has to conquer his fear of water to save the day! // When Lola and Sir Steel become stuck together, they have no choice but to work as a team!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bays famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Garden Academy S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Move your Hands and Legs! - Margarita and Rose play and learn how to jump and applause using their legs and hands. At the same time they have fun with a new musical instrument at the garden.

programme.title: Garden Academy S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Taking Care of your Body - Monte and Col review with the Learning Tree and it's Gardener Tim, everything learned the last lessons. They talk about the body and the importance of taking care of it, keeping it clean with a shower, or washing hands before eating.

programme.title: Garden Academy S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Number 5 - Through the fun teaching of the Learning Tree and it's Gardener Tim, the curious students (monte and col), learn about the number five while they exercise together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - Its a hot day and the pups head for the water park but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals dont show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep702

programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep305

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Fan Club / Speeding Steel - After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Pick and Chew / Mr. Bossy and Mr. Turtle / Dance Like Everyone's Watching - Bossy, Turtle and Bissy are overwhelmed when Mom and Dad let them order at a pizza place. // Miss Elky lets Bossy and Turtle take over for the day. // Turtle is afraid to dance in front of a huge crowd.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe.

programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Loud and Quiet - Kit and Pup are playing instruments. Can you hear who is playing the loud instrument and who is playing the quiet instrument? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators make shakers.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hat - Dee encourages a friend to say hat and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep90
programme.desc: Noise - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Peekaboo - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Major's Greatest Invention - Major invents a Clanger finder, but it is not very useful - it always finds the Clanger who is holding it. Major is disappointed - he hadn't thought of that!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Top of the Mountain - The friends go on a mountain hiking competition.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep70
programme.desc: Birds-eye View - Bo needs to complete his nature-trail assignment but he can't find a shy bird. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep14

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Pals - Jimmy Jones grows jealous when Monty brings home the class guinea pig for the weekend, leading them to wonder if being best friends means that you can't have other friends too.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep4

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lost in Fog - It's very foggy in the Camping Park, the girls use sound to find their way around.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep33

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep14

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep15
programme.desc: Muddy Matters - It is the day of the Farmer's Fair on Sodor. The Fat Controller arrives at Tidmouth Sheds to give the engines their duties for the day. One engine is to take Farmer McColl's sheep to the fair and that engine will have his photograph taken for the daily ne

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Wagon Ride - Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Shape Badge - It is a lovely day and the squirrels are playing outside. They are playing the shape game. Working out which shape goes where is quite tricky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Juice Badge - Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from the garden. Whilst picking the fruit, the squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

programme.desc: Gills - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy wants to know how his goldfish friend can stay underwater for so long. He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Pals - Jimmy Jones grows jealous when Monty brings home the class guinea pig for the weekend, leading them to wonder if being best friends means that you can't have other friends too.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep4
programme.desc: It's Time To Open a Shop - After visiting Jared's shop, JoJo and Gran Gran set up their own shop at home - if you pay with panda pounds, you can buy anything and everything.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lost in Fog - It's very foggy in the Camping Park, the girls use sound to find their way around.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep14

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep24

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Shape Badge - It is a lovely day and the squirrels are playing outside. They are playing the shape game. Working out which shape goes where is quite tricky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Juice Badge - Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from the garden. Whilst picking the fruit, the squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Allotments - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how allotments play an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Andy and the Glass Frog - Andy heads to Costa Rica in search of a glass frog to see how it looks after its young.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep26

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain - The Musical - In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Seesaw - Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Good, the Bad and the Prickly - Prickly Pear arrives in the Supermarket and tries to take over Evil Pea's freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isn't mean at all and just needed some good friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.desc: Dorg Gets a Pimple / Dorg the Dorgnificent - Desperate for a good yearbook photo, Dorg asks Patronella to magically remove the pimple on his chin. // When Dorg tries casting a spell at his sister's birthday party and Patronella turns into a tiger, he learns that magic really does take patience.

programme.desc: Simon Says - When Alvin accuses Simon of being too safe, Simon agrees to do whatever crazy thing Alvin wants him to do.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: Madani Anwar Tunjangi Malaysia (Rpt)
programme.desc: Sejak menerajui kerajaan pada 24 November 2022, Perdana Menteri ke-10 Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim telah menyerlahkan kemampuannya untuk mengurus negara dengan baik menerusi pelbagai usaha dan strategi. Dokumentari ini menceritakan perjalanan pentadbiran kerajaan persekutuan pimpinan Datuk Seri Anwar yang menoktahkan penantian 24 tahun Pengerusi Pakatan Harapan (PH) itu untuk bergelar Perdana Menteri.

programme.title: Strong Women Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Leigh was inspired by her mother to try Strongman and became an icon after lifting the legendary Scottish Dinnie Stones. Mari is eager to succeed but the challenge is high. Will she be able to lift a car?

programme.title: AFLW - Preliminary Final - North Melbourne Tasmania v Adelaide Crows Ep58
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Three-time AFLW Premiers the Adelaide Crows defeated the Swans in the Semi Final. The North Melbourne Tasmania Kangaroos host a Preliminary Final in Melbourne as the Kangaroos look to advance to their first AFLW Grand Final.

programme.title: Landline Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: Compass - Awe Hunters with Julia Baird Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Julia Baird faces down the darkness of her cancer diagnosis and joins fellow seekers of wonder. She discovers that awe has shaped our civilisations, driven people to change their lives and ultimately make them happier.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Join Chas and John by the fake fireplace in the fake Oval Office as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the 2024 race.

programme.title: Wing Threads
programme.desc: A journey around Australia on the smallest of wings. Zoologist turned pilot, Amellia Formby, is on a mission to share her love for migratory shorebirds.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Mud and Mangroves Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves, for a muddy encounter with a feisty mud crab, a shovel-nosed ray that he catches bare-handed and a mosquito, well quite a lot of mosquitoes that almost eat him alive.

programme.title: Strong Women Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Leigh was inspired by her mother to try Strongman and became an icon after lifting the legendary Scottish Dinnie Stones. Mari is eager to succeed but the challenge is high. Will she be able to lift a car?

programme.title: The First Inventors - A Connected Society Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Vast communication networks, trade superhighways, and sophisticated kinship systems. How First Nations people built an extraordinarily connected society on this enormous and often inhospitable continent.

programme.title: Who Gets To Stay In Australia? Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - For the first time, cameras record a hearing inside Australia's Appeals Tribunal as a Peruvian man fights for his life. Meanwhile, a wealthy English family faces deportation.

programme.title: Compass - Awe Hunters with Julia Baird Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Julia Baird faces down the darkness of her cancer diagnosis and joins fellow seekers of wonder. She discovers that awe has shaped our civilisations, driven people to change their lives and ultimately make them happier.

programme.title: Art Works - Tina Turner, Rod McNicol, Ugly Art Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - We meet the stars of Tina Turner: The Musical; Namila heads to the Fitzroy studio of acclaimed portrait photographer Rod McNicol; we get a lesson in ugly art; plus a spotlight on the work of Arts Project Australia.

programme.title: Australian Story - Stepping Up - Elly-May Barnes Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Singer Elly-May Barnes on stepping out of her famous father Jimmy's musical shadow, on the long road to the spotlight and how she channels her physical challenges into a powerful cabaret act.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2023 Heywire project. Hosted by Isaac Muller.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep95
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Landline Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep95

programme.title: Insiders Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, bringing together a panel of leading political analysts and commentators to review the week in politics and to preview the final sitting fortnight in Parliament.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australia win the One Day Cricket World Cup. Kelli Underwood and the panel cover the latest cricket, recap the Lions v Cats AFLW Preliminary Finals and preview Kangaroos v Crows plus the AFL Draft and Socceroos v Palestine.

programme.title: Australian Story - Stepping Up - Elly-May Barnes Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Singer Elly-May Barnes on stepping out of her famous father Jimmy's musical shadow, on the long road to the spotlight and how she channels her physical challenges into a powerful cabaret act.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and international markets, analysing what's going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep45
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Bridget Brennan, Tony Armstrong and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Jane explores a native garden; Costa meets horticulture educators; Tammy prunes potted plants; Clarence plants out a pond; Millie starts up her spring patch; Sophie tidies insect hotels; plus we meet a potato-growing prodigy.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Dooralong Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Electrician Mick takes on the challenge of a lifetime when he and artist wife Belynda decide to build their dream Modernist home in the bucolic Dooralong Valley, on the New South Wales, Central Coast.

programme.title: Landline Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep216
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep221
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel sharing a range of perspectives. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep185
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep236
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep173
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep236

programme.desc: On a pilgrimage down sacred trails, follow a kitty through a majestic forest. Meet a hunting master at a 1,300-year-old temple, and wait patiently for homemade bread at a seaside cafe.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: Baki the Grappler is a martial arts manga series from Itagaki Keisuke. Learn how the manga changed the martial arts genre and get a special look at the anime, which became a major streaming hit.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: U&I
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: home water purifiers & plastic valves.

programme.title: Through The Kitchen Window
programme.desc: Rie left Tokyo to get married in a rural village. Running a chestnut farm and welcoming people with her unique cooking, her life changed drastically.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Nendore Nandore Mr. Clay!"...

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street Mini
programme.desc: Wellington is the capital of New Zealand. It was built by European settlers in the 19th century. It has a free spirit that allows both men and women to chase their dreams and let their talents soar.

programme.title: Tokyo Time-Lapse
programme.desc: Stunning time-lapse images offer a new angle on Tokyo. We hope you enjoy these original takes on what may be the world's most exciting metropolis! This time: Water.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 26, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.desc: We meet Australian Michael No who performs a mounted archery ritual at a shrine in Tochigi, and Tantely Rasoanjanahary from Madagascar who works at a food-processing machinery maker in Hiroshima.

programme.title: Nun'S Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to prepare two tasty condiments made with fresh yuzu zest : yuzu pepper and sweet yuzu miso.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.desc: #1 Where is Haru-san House? / Learn how to ask about locations. If you want to know where something is, simply put "wa doko desu ka" after its name.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Allen vs. Craig
programme.desc: Prelims - In a wide-open middleweight division, every fight is an important one, and on November 18, 185-pound contenders Brendan Allen and Paul Craig collide in a UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas that will set up a huge 2024 campaign for the winner. Winner of five straight with four finishes and a pair of Performance of the Night bonuses, Allen is surging at the perfect time for this fall matchup with Craig, the Scottish submission machine, who announced his arrival to the division in July with an impressive stoppage of Andre Muniz

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
